alert.note: Alert for Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 6:18AM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Grand Valley. In Utah, Arches/Grand Flat. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
